sys_script_include.name: GovsmaRecordUtilsAjax

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_77ebb53183ce369078c11a30ceaad39d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1850706_govsma_0.GovsmaRecordUtilsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>GovsmaRecordUtilsAjax</name><sandbox_callable>true</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var GovsmaRecordUtilsAjax = Class.create();
GovsmaRecordUtilsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    ajaxGetValue: function () {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(this.getParameter('sysparm_table'));
        if (gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'))) {
            return gr.getValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_field'));
        }
        return '';
    },

    ajaxUpdateValue: function () {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(this.getParameter('sysparm_table'));
        if (gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'))) {
            gr.setValue(
                this.getParameter('sysparm_field'),
                this.getParameter('sysparm_value')
            );
            gr.update();
            return 'ok';
        }
        return 'fail';
    },

    type: 'GovsmaRecordUtilsAjax'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-26 22:38:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>77ebb53183ce369078c11a30ceaad39d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GovsmaRecordUtilsAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GovSmart Review &amp; Visit Management System" source="x_1850706_govsma_0">e0e99de183fdf21078c11a30ceaad3e5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GovSmart Review &amp; Visit Management System">e0e99de183fdf21078c11a30ceaad3e5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_77ebb53183ce369078c11a30ceaad39d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-27 00:43:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
